events.message: The customer submitted a claim reporting a car accident that happened on the morning of April 30th involving their vehicle and another driver.
The claim was reviewed and categorized under Auto Accident based on the description of the collision and vehicle damage.
An agent specialized in auto claims was assigned to the file to handle communication and assist the customer throughout the process.
The claim acknowledgement was sent to the customer confirming receipt and explaining the next steps in the claims process.
The agent requested photos of the vehicle damage, police report, and insurance information to proceed with the investigation.
The customer promptly sent all requested documents including detailed photos of the damaged car and the official police report.
The investigation into the claim was officially started to evaluate the collision details and the liability of involved parties.
Investigation concluded affirming that the other driver was at fault, and the customer's vehicle damage claims are fully supported.
A settlement offer was prepared and proposed to the customer outlining compensation for repairs and related expenses.
The customer responded positively to the settlement offer, expressing satisfaction with the timely resolution and communication.
The claim was officially approved following acceptance of the settlement terms by the customer.
Payment for the approved claim was transferred successfully to the customerâ€™s account to cover vehicle repair costs.
The claim was officially closed after payment issuance and confirmation from the customer regarding repair progress.
